name: Police Catch- escaping games
description:
Hi dear users, we welcome you to our new project where we have number of fast cars racing in urban- rural open environments. Roam freely and keep racing explore the playground discover the new missions. While completing missions specifically timed one you have to drive harshly breaking the rules, so you may get police squad following you with helicopters and police cars. Run fast, dodge the police and complete the mission. Keep racing and playing to explore new surprise tasks to do.
Have the best experience of car racing games.
Please give us feedback to let us ensure best quality product for our valuable users.
